name: Stampy
description:
Top trumps prototype using UE4 multiplayer blueprints. Two players can connect to each other when attached to the same network and allowed through firewall.

To play, open two clients. Click "Play Stampy" on the first client and "Find game" on the second client - the client will search for the host you started and populate the server list. Click on the server to join the game.

Take it in turns to select one of the buttons, Views, Subs, Videos and Rank position. The player who wins all of their opponents cards is the winner.
